perturbation.original_text:
The following capitalized terms will have the meanings set forth below:
 
“Subscriber” means any individual who purchases mobile content programming and: (a) who actually pays the applicable Subscription Fee; and (b) does not
receive a refund of such Subscription Fee for any reason within thirty (30) days from the end of the payment period for which the Subscription Fee was paid. A
Subscriber remains a “Subscriber” for the purposes of this Agreement so long as such individual continues to pay the applicable Subscription Fee.
perturbation.changed_text:
The following capitalized terms will have the meanings set forth below:
 
“Subscriber” means any individual who accesses mobile content programming. Payment of the applicable Subscription Fee may be required, or waived at the discretion of the Distributor. A
Subscriber may or may not remain a “Subscriber” for the purposes of this Agreement regardless of whether such individual continues to pay the applicable Subscription Fee. The Distributor reserves the right to designate individuals as Subscribers.
perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly defines a 'Subscriber' as someone who pays the subscription fee and doesn't receive a refund within 30 days. It also specifies that a subscriber remains so as long as they continue to pay. The modified text contradicts this by stating that payment of fees may be waived, and that subscriber status can be independent of payment and determined at the distributor's discretion, thus creating confusion about the definition.

perturbation.explanation: The original text clearly grants non-exclusive rights to the distributor. The modified text introduces a contradiction by stating the rights are non-exclusive but then allows for the possibility of exclusive distribution for certain content. This creates ambiguity as to which content is non-exclusive and which can be exclusive, requiring additional agreements and potentially leading to disputes.

perturbation.original_text:
The IMNTV Programming will not contain any advertising, either integrated or before or after each clip, except IMNTV I’Ds and IMNTV commercials for
solicitation of Chinese music videos,without the prior written approval of both parties.
perturbation.changed_text:
The IMNTV Programming will not contain any advertising, either integrated or before or after each clip, except IMNTV I’Ds and IMNTV commercials for
solicitation of Chinese music videos,without the prior written approval of both parties. Distributor may also insert its own advertisements as long as they comply with local advertising regulations and do not exceed 20% of the total programming time.
perturbation.explanation: The original text strictly limits advertising within IMNTV Programming to IMNTV I'Ds and commercials, requiring prior written approval for anything else. The modified text contradicts this by allowing the Distributor to insert their own advertisements, subject only to local regulations and a time limit, without requiring IMNTV's approval. This weakens IMNTV's control over the content and creates potential conflicts regarding advertising content and revenue sharing.
